latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

dsDescriptionValue.value: a)  Understand the operation of the Bangladesh rural household economy;  b) Analyze the drivers of change in income distribution and poverty;  c)  Prepare technical background papers to facilitating policy dialogues under the project "Poverty Elimination Through Rice Research Assistance (PETRRA)" in Bangladesh;  d) Assess the impact of rice research on poverty reduction in Bangladesh using the Sustainable Livelihood Framework; and  e)  Estimating parameters on the determinants of rural household incomes for use in poverty mapping for Bangladesh.

keywordValue.value: Input-output of crop production (yield, labor, material inputs) land holdings, sources of income

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 1,888;

value: Sixty-two villages in 57  out of 64 districts of the country
